instructions: Enter your Google credentials to log into the Google Tasks app on your mobile device. View the list of existing tasks. To mark a task as complete, tap the circle next to it. That task will then be crossed out and moved to Completed . To add tasks, hit the plus sign at the bottom of the screen. Tap the menu button at the bottom left corner of the screen to create and name additional lists, to rename or delete a list, or to delete all the completed tasks.
